title: Atmospheric Fantasy Music
description: 10 beautiful, mysterious fantasy music tracks in two versions - with tail and loopable.
longDescription:
MISTWOOD | Atmospheric Fantasy Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


This music pack contains 10 music tracks in two variations (full with tail and seamless loops, which gives 20 tracks total).

Designed for Fantasy Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Perfect for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


The pack includes:

 ➼ 10 Professionally mastered original tracks in two variations

 ➼ Minutes of audio provided: full 38 min 32 sec | seamless loops 37 min 40 sec

 ➼ CD-quality 24/44.1 kHz .wav format


TRACKLIST (44.1kHz, 24bit, Stereo)

▶ Ashen Prophecy | full mix - 3:50 | loop - 3:47

▶ Whispering Shadows | full mix - 3:45 | loop - 3:40

▶ Secret Garden | full mix - 4:02 | loop - 3:56

▶ Spellbound | full mix - 3:45 | loop - 3:42

▶ The Ritual | full mix - 4:29 | loop - 4:22

▶ Immortal | full mix - 3:24 | loop - 3:18

▶ Crypt of the Fallen | full mix - 3:26 | loop - 3:21

▶ Illusion | full mix - 4:00 | loop - 3:54

▶ The Gravekeeper | full mix - 3:29 | loop - 3:24

▶ Guardian of Nature | full mix - 4:22 | loop - 4:16


If you're looking for original music for your project, feel free to reach out to me at wiktoriazac@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 1411kbps, 24 bits, Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes
